name: Zombie Treasure Chest - Explore The Secret Evil Spooky Cave World And Bag Brains!
name_original: Zombie Treasure Chest - Explore The Secret Evil Spooky Cave World And Bag Brains!
description:
Are you brave enough to Run through the SPOOKY CAVE? Don’t be scared! You are a Zombie!

What kind of treasure do zombies like?? Yummy BRAINS! Collect as many as you can! Mmmm… BRAINNNSSS…

Survive the run to find your treasure. Look out at hot little volcanoes and watch out the tricky patches of slippery ice! Overcome obstacles to grab all your treasures!!!

And DON'T FALL DOWN!!! Or it's all game over! (Even more over than it already was, considering YOU'RE A ZOMBIE!!!)

This game features

»»» GREAT FUN APP WHICH IS GREAT FOR ALL AGES!
»»» IOS8 READY!
»»» SPOOKY MUSIC!
»»» 100% PURE FUN FUN FUN!!!!


Note there are no in app purchases in this app but it is advert supported :)

If you love this game, please support it by leaving a review in the app store. Thanks for your help we really appreciate it!
